name: Piggy Royale
description:
Protect your little ones and their homes from the big bad wolves!

Train your piggies and upgrade their weapons to reach higher Tiers!
Take a break from defending dungeons and protect piggy homes!

* Overview

- Power shot away your enemies with realistic impact!
- Wipe out a horde of wolves with a power skill!
- The more upgrades your pigs have, the more they will take down those wolves!
- Get more Tiers to be stronger with special abilities!
- Whenever wolves die, they will burst into petals to protect the little ones.

Good luck and have fun, and let your friends know about our little piggies!
